projects.title: This Website
projects.description: This website has been a great jump into web design for me. Never before have I made a website entirely from scratch that didn't look like it was made in MS Paint. This experience has given me a much better perspective on the web development and design process, and has re-familiarized me with HTML and CSS. This site has also been my first experience using SvelteKit - it makes everything seem so effortless compared to my experiences in the past. SvelteKit's easy routing and layout system combined with Tailwind and Skeleton has made designing and creating this website so much less of a chore, and actually something that I've enjoyed. This site will also be my first experience using Vercel to deploy any kind of app online. I'm excited to experiment and add more features to this site and watch it mature - lots of things on my to-do list!

projects.title: Discord Bots
projects.description: I've made a few Discord Bots for utility, and for fun. One of them makes dad jokes, one of them checks whether a source server is running, and another was for moderation. Only the dad jokes one is public - I should really get around to making the other ones public too.

projects.title: Garry's Mod Addons
projects.description:
Over many years I worked to create and maintain custom addons for a server I ran on a game called Garry's Mod. This server began in 2014 and was shut down in 2022. I worked on these addons both solo and with a fellow developer and friend, and spent many late nights debugging really horrible spaghetti code.

I learned a whole bunch through these addons. Before this, the most advanced programming I had done were some JavaScript tutorials on codecademy.com. I find it really fun to look back at how it all began with horribly optimized implementations. If I were to do this whole thing again, you can bet I'd do it a lot differently.

Very much looking forward to S&box's full release.
